attributes.action: GET BUCHAN COMMUNITY RADIO ON FM RADIO FULL TIME!
attributes.additional_details:
We broadcast hit music from the last 60 years, plus specialist programmes, news and local community information, 24 hours a day, seven days a week and  we are here to inform and entertain the people of North East as well as playing an active part in the local community and providing training opportunities.

We also do alot of work in the Community and work with people with l special needs and disability.
attributes.background: BCR FM was setup in 2012 as an Internet station to serve the community in Peterhead & the north east  We broadcast online at www.bcrfm.com we also go on FM 2 months a year until we get a full time licence.

rejection.details: If there is a specific action that you would like the Government or Parliament to take, and it is something that they are responsible for, you could start a new petition about that.
